title: Readout of President Donald J. Trump’s Call with Amir Tamim bin Hamad Al Thani of Qatar – The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			

		Foreign Policy	

Issued on:
September 8, 2017
President Donald J. Trump spoke yesterday with Amir Tamim bin Hamad Al Thani of Qatar.  The President underscored the importance of all countries following through on commitments from the Riyadh Summit to maintain unity while defeating terrorism, cutting off funding for terrorist groups, and combating extremist ideology.  President Trump and Amir Tamim also discussed the continued threat Iran poses to regional stability.
